Beauty Under Capitalism
Other BoBB.O.M.B. list

Other black owned beauty brands

The following brands fit one or more of the following the criteria:

  • not majority women-owned (either by founding or through an exit)
  • tests on animals where required by law

AJ Crimson Beauty

Cosmetics for multicultural complexions. Try their nude lipsticks made just for women of color, or Flour setting powders.

Owned by founder and CEO AJ Crimson in San Diego, CA.

FORM Beauty

Haircare for all textures, for people of all ethnic backgrounds. Try their customized regimen just for your hair.

Owned by Walker & Company, which is owned and founded by CEO Tristan Walker.

IMAN Cosmetics

Cosmetics specifically for multicutural women since 1994. Try their award-winning, moisturizing Skin Tone Evener BB Creme.

Owned by Impala Inc, founded by supermodel Iman.

Pat McGrath Labs

Cosmetics where unadulterated experimentation meets raw glamour. Tested on animals when required by law. Try their Mothership eyeshadow palettes, or luxe Mattetrance Lipsticks.

Owned by founder and CEO, global makeup artist Pat McGrath.

True Moringa

Skincare that serves 2,500 small family farmers across Ghana. Try their for face, hair, and body 100% pure cold-pressed moringa oil.

Co-owned by Co-founder Kwami Williams.
